title: Tamil Vocabulary Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Tamil vocabulary

tasks.title: Task 1: Basic Tamil Words
tasks.description: Learn and test your knowledge of basic Tamil words

questions.question: What is the Tamil word for 'water'?
What is the Tamil word for 'food'?
What is the Tamil word for 'friend'?

tasks.title: Task 2: Tamil Sentences
tasks.description: Practice forming and understanding Tamil sentences

questions.question: Which sentence means 'My name is Ramesh' in Tamil?
questions.explanation: என் பெயர் ரமேஷ் means 'My name is Ramesh' in Tamil

tasks.title: Task 3: Tamil Grammar
tasks.description: Test your understanding of Tamil grammar rules

questions.question: Which is the correct form of past tense for 'to go' in Tamil?
questions.explanation: போனேன் (Ponen) is the past tense form of 'to go' in Tamil

title: Malayalam Vocabulary Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Malayalam vocabulary

tasks.title: Task 1: Basic Malayalam Words
tasks.description: Learn and test your knowledge of basic Malayalam words

questions.question: What is the Malayalam word for 'water'?

title: General Knowledge Quiz
description: Test your general knowledge on various topics

tasks.title: Task 1: World Capitals
tasks.description: Test your knowledge of world capitals

questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital city of France
